survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Electric Scooters Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, usage patterns, and satisfaction levels regarding electric scooters for urban commuting.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use electric scooters for commuting?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use electric scooters for commuting?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an electric scooter? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Limit to 3 selections to prioritize key factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Set max selections to 3.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an electric scooter? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: What is the maximum price you would pay for an electric scooter?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Price ranges should reflect common market segments.

script.question_text: What is the maximum price you would pay for an electric scooter?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in electric scooters?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in electric scooters?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using electric scooters?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Follow-up questions can be added based on 'Yes' response.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using electric scooters?
